explains: v. 使……变柔软（soften 的过去分词）

sentences.en: She softened her tone a little.
sentences.cn: 她稍稍缓和了一下语气。

sentences.en: His face softened as he looked at his son.
sentences.cn: 他看着儿子，紧绷的面孔松弛下来。

sentences.en: His party's policy has softened a lot in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近年来他所在政党的政策变得温和了许多。
